|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;FEMDNN032G-A3A55; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2024 |estprice = 46 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0CRF2XZKK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Fn-Link 6222B-SRC |rad1modif = M.2 (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8822CS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NanoPi R2S Plus" and "2309" is silk-screened on both sides of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3228 @1.5GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 64GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports, 1x USB-C port (power + slave) *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R2S_Plus ''NanoPi R2S Plus'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/cost-effective-nanopi-r2s-plus-emerges-with-wi-fi-and-emmc-support/ ''Cost-effective NanoPi R2S Plus Router Board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2024/01/06/nanopi-r2s-plus-dual-gbe-sbc-router-32gb-flash-usb-c-debug-port-m2-wifi/ ''NanoPi R2S Plus dual GbE SBC and router'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> NanoPi R2S Plus Top.jpeg|Board Top NanoPi R2S Plus Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom NanoPi R2S Plus Internal.jpeg|Internal view </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
